001package edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.controller;
002
003import android.content.Intent;
004import android.transition.Slide;
005import android.view.Gravity;
006import android.view.Menu;
007import android.view.MenuItem;
008import android.view.Window;
009import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
010import androidx.appcompat.app.AppCompatActivity;
011import android.os.Bundle;
012import androidx.core.app.ActivityOptionsCompat;
013import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
014import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
015import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.R;
016import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.databinding.ActivityMainBinding;
017import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.model.Passphrase;
018import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.service.PassphraseServiceProxy;
019import edu.cnm.deepdive.passphrase.viewmodel.LoginViewModel;
020import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
021import javax.inject.Inject;
022
023@AndroidEntryPoint
024public class MainActivity extends AppCompatActivity {
025
026  private ActivityMainBinding binding;
027  private LoginViewModel viewModel;
028
029
030  @Override
031  protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
032    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
033    getWindow().requestFeature(Window.FEATURE_ACTIVITY_TRANSITIONS);
034    getWindow().setEnterTransition(new Slide(Gravity.START)); //add effect to windows
035    getWindow().setExitTransition(new Slide(Gravity.START));
036    binding = ActivityMainBinding.inflate(getLayoutInflater());
037    setContentView(binding.getRoot());
038    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(this)
039        .get(LoginViewModel.class);
040    viewModel.getAccount()
041        .observe(this, (account) -> {
042          if(account != null){
043           // binding.name.setText(account.getDisplayName());
044          }else {
045            Intent intent = new Intent(this, LoginActivity.class)
046                .addFlags(Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_CLEAR_TASK | Intent.FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK);
047            //noinspection unchecked
048            startActivity(intent, ActivityOptionsCompat.makeSceneTransitionAnimation(this).toBundle());
049          }
050        });
051  }
052
053  @Override
054  public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu) {
055    super.onCreateOptionsMenu(menu);
056    getMenuInflater().inflate(R.menu.main_options, menu);
057    return true;
058  }
059
060  @Override
061  public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem item) {
062    boolean handled;
063    if(item.getItemId() == R.id.sign_out){
064      viewModel.signOut();
065      handled = true;
066    }else {
067      handled = super.onOptionsItemSelected(item);
068    }
069    return handled;
070  }
071}
